name: vibethink-orchestrator
description: VThink 1.0 Enterprise SaaS Platform with AI Integration

scripts.kill-node: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>$null; Write-Host 'Node.js processes killed' -ForegroundColor Green"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:login" "npm run dev:helpdesk"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:admin && npm run build:login && npm run build:helpdesk && npm run build:website
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:dashboard && npm run lint:admin && npm run lint:login && npm run lint:helpdesk
scripts.test:all: npm run test:dashboard && npm run test:admin && npm run test:login && npm run test:helpdesk
scripts.validate:universal: npm run validate:ecosystem && npm run validate:duplication && npm run validate:integration && npm run validate:ui-generic && npm run validate:architecture && npm run validate:multilang && npm run validate:npm-install && npm run validate:rules-degradation
scripts.ai:after-changes: npm run validate:universal && npm run dev
scripts.ai:safe-commit: npm run validate:universal && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.ai:recovery: git stash && npm run validate:universal && git stash pop
scripts.install:apps: cd apps/dashboard && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../login && npm install && cd ../helpdesk && npm install
scripts.clean:unix: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf .next && rm -rf apps/*/.next
scripts.clean:win: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Write-Host 'Cleaning root...'; if (Test-Path 'node_modules') { try { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'node_modules' -ErrorAction Stop; Write-Host 'Root node_modules removed' } catch { Write-Warning 'Some files in root node_modules are locked. Try closing all terminals/editors and run again.' } }; if (Test-Path '.next') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force '.next'; Write-Host 'Root .next removed' }; Write-Host 'Cleaning apps...'; Get-ChildItem 'apps' -Directory | ForEach-Object { Write-Host \"Processing $($_.Name)...\"; $nm = Join-Path $_.FullName 'node_modules'; if (Test-Path $nm) { try { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $nm -ErrorAction Stop; Write-Host \"$($_.Name) node_modules removed\" } catch { Write-Warning \"Some files in $($_.Name) node_modules are locked\" } }; $next = Join-Path $_.FullName '.next'; if (Test-Path $next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $next; Write-Host \"$($_.Name) .next removed\" } }; Write-Host 'Cleanup completed!'"
scripts.clean:next:win: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-ChildItem 'apps' -Directory | ForEach-Object { $next = Join-Path $_.FullName '.next'; if (Test-Path $next) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $next } } ; if (Test-Path '.next') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force '.next' }"
scripts.clean:force: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Write-Host 'Force cleanup - may require admin rights...'; taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>$null; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; if (Test-Path 'node_modules') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'node_modules' }; Get-ChildItem 'apps' -Directory | ForEach-Object { $nm = Join-Path $_.FullName 'node_modules'; if (Test-Path $nm) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $nm } }; Write-Host 'Force cleanup completed!'"
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: VibeThink Team
